--- title: Introduction --- export const Title = () => ( ARM Lab Introduction
) ; **QOTD intro - To Do** In the following Labs, will illustrates how IBM Turbonomic, a solution based on the principles of Application Resource Management (ARM), helps SREs and IT Ops teams proactively assure application performance and operational efficiency across their mission critical deployments. you will examin: - How Turbonomic stitches together a full-stack view of your multi-cloud software deployments - Examine the resource optimization recommendations generated by Turbonomic - Automate the execution of recommended actions

--- title: Introduction --- export const Title = () => ( ARM Lab Introduction
) ; **QOTD intro - To Do** In the following Labs, will illustrates how IBM Turbonomic, a solution based on the principles of Application Resource Management (ARM), helps SREs and IT Ops teams proactively assure application performance and operational efficiency across their mission critical deployments. you will examin: - How Turbonomic stitches together a full-stack view of your multi-cloud software deployments - Examine the resource optimization recommendations generated by Turbonomic - Automate the execution of recommended actions
